title: When opening up the Videos - Highlights section all videos listed will be accurate, readable and display the correct icon
custom_preconds: Given the user views the Video Tab
custom_steps: WHEN we have selected the Videos tab
custom_expected: THEN all videos listed will be accurate, readable & display the correct icon

title: When traversing through the Video - Highlights the text and thumbnails are formatted appropriately
custom_preconds: Given the user views the Video Tab
custom_steps: WHEN we have selected the Video tab
custom_expected: THEN the formatting of the text & thumbnails appears consistent

title: When scrolling through the Video - Highlights section initially we will see an MiLB placeholder icon before the video's thumbnail loads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have selected the Video menu
AND we haven't scrolled through the Videos list yet
custom_steps: WHEN we scroll through the Videos list
custom_expected: THEN we will briefly see a placeholder icon for each video before it's thumbnail loads

title: Thumbnail Contents/Accuracy and Legibility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has tapped on the Video tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user examines the contents of the video thumbnail
custom_expected:
THEN the thumbnail will contain a title in white bolded font
AND the time/date stamp will be below the the title
AND a Share icon will be in the lower right-hand corner (if enabled)
AND all text present will be clear and legible

title: Highlights Index Scrollable
custom_preconds: GIVEN has tapped on the Video tab
custom_steps:
WHEN the user attempts to scroll down
AND the user attempts to scroll up
custom_expected:
THEN the scrolling in either direction will be possible
AND the inertial scrolling will be smooth

title: Tapping on Highlight Thumbnail
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps on the Video tab
custom_steps: WHEN a video thumbnail is tapped
custom_expected: THEN the video playback for the selected highlight will begin

title: Class Switcher Button Functionality
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has tapped on the Videos tab
custom_steps: WHEN the More dropdown button is tapped
custom_expected:
THEN the Class Selector will open
AND all Classes will show - Triple-A, Double-A, Class A Advanced, Class A Full Season, Class A Short Season, Rookie

title: Opening Favorite Teams Highlights
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has set up a Favorite Team(s)
- in the More section of the app select either the Favorite team(s) located at the top
or 
- tap on Teams tab and select the Favorite team, indicated by a star
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Video tab
custom_expected: THEN the team video highlights index will open for that specific team

title: Using Controller UI During Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has tapped on the Video tab
AND the user taps on a Video Thumbnail
AND the user notices that playback has started
custom_steps: WHEN the screen is tapped
custom_expected:
THEN the video controller UI will appear onscreen
AND all button/controllers will perform their specified functions correctly

title: Triple-A Videos displaying
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user has enabled Double-A mode

* If videos do not display (i.e. Unable to load with refresh icon) then contact XXX and they will resolve via HomeBase.
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses the More button
AND Select 'Triple-A'
AND returns to the Video page
custom_expected:
THEN the Double-A Video Highlights will no longer be present
AND only Triple-A Video Highlights will display

title: Double-A Videos displaying
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user has enabled Double-A mode

* If videos do not display (i.e. Unable to load with refresh icon) then contact XXX and they will resolve via HomeBase.
custom_steps: WHEN the user has taps on the Videos tab
custom_expected: THEN only Double-A Video Highlights will display

title: Class-A Advanced Videos displaying
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user has enabled Class-A Advanced mode

* If videos do not display (i.e. Unable to load with refresh icon) then contact xxx and they will resolve via HomeBase.
custom_steps: WHEN the user has taps on the Videos tab
custom_expected: THEN only Class A Advanced Video Highlights will display

title: Class-A Full Videos displaying
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user has enabled Class-A Full mode

* If videos do not display (i.e. Unable to load with refresh icon) then contact xxx and they will resolve via HomeBase.
custom_steps: WHEN the user has taps on the Videos tab
custom_expected: THEN only Class A Full Video Highlights will display

title: Class-A Short Videos displaying
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user has enabled Class-A Short mode

* If videos do not display (i.e. Unable to load with refresh icon) then contact xxx and they will resolve via HomeBase.
custom_steps: WHEN the user has taps on the Videos tab
custom_expected: THEN only Class A Short Video Highlights will display

title: Rookie Videos displaying
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Video page
AND the user has enabled Class-A Short mode

* If videos do not display (i.e. Unable to load with refresh icon) then contact xxx and he will resolve via HomeBase.
custom_steps: WHEN the user has taps on the Videos tab
custom_expected: THEN only Rookie Video Highlights will display

title: Playing Video (no pre-roll)
custom_preconds:
Access video by:
- Main Slide out Menu Videos tab
- Team Page, Video tab
custom_steps: When the user plays an on-demand video highlight
custom_expected:
Then the video should play
and should not pause to access a pre-roll video

title: Tapping Share Icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Highlights index
AND there are highlights that are shareable in the index
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the share icon in the lower right corner of the thumbnail
custom_expected:
THEN a menu will pop up
AND will contain a Tweet button
AND will contain a Post to Facebook button
AND will contain an Email a Link Button
AND will contain a Message button
AND will contain a Cancel button

title: Twitter - Logged In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged into Twitter
AND has navigated to the highlights page
AND the user has tapped on the share icon in the thumbnail image
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps the Tweet button
custom_expected:
THEN the Tweet sheet will appear onscreen with the following:
- the format should display the title of the video followed by Sent with MiLB
- the last line should be the actual link to the video

title: Twitter - Ensure Tweet is Properly Formatted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user launched the app
AND is on a video highlight that's shareable and taps on Share to Twitter
custom_steps: WHEN the user submits the Tweet
custom_expected:
THEN on the actual tweet should appear
AND the format should display the title of the video followed by Sent with MiLB
AND the last line should be the shortened atmilb link, actual link, to the video

title: Facebook - Not Logged In
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is not logged into Facebook
custom_steps: WHEN the Post to Facebook button is tapped
custom_expected: THEN the user will be directed to the Facebook login page

title: Facebook - User is logged In
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into Facebook on the device
custom_steps: WHEN the Post to Facebook button is tapped
custom_expected: THEN the Post to Wall page will open

title: Facebook - Ensure Status is Properly Formatted
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Videos page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the share arrow
AND then taps on Post to Facebook
custom_expected:
THEN the Facebook Post to Wall page will appear
AND the actual post will display the video thumbnail & caption followed by www.milb.com
AND will state it's via MiLB.com

title: Email a Link Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the the user has set up an email account on the device
custom_steps: WHEN the Email a Link button is tapped
custom_expected: THEN device's native email client will open an email form

title: Email a Link Properly Formatted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Videos page
AND has an email account setup on the device
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the share button for a Video
AND selects the Email a Link button
custom_expected:
THEN the email draft will appear
AND be formatted with the video highlight title & Sent with MiLB

title: Message
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has tapped the share icon on a video thumbnail
custom_steps: WHEN the Message button is tapped
custom_expected: THEN the device message client will open

title: Message Formatted Properly
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Video Highlights page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the share arrow on the video
AND then taps on the Message button
custom_expected:
THEN a New Message screen will appear
AND once the message is sent it will be formatted with just a video link that will push on the wap site
